full_text: Re: Draft language From Hugh Hurwitz To Ray Ormond Date 2019/08/12 06:27 Subject: Re: Draft language Attachments: TEXT.htm (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) an help if needed too. Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone ------- Original message ------- From: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov> Date: 8/12/19 6:01 AM (GMT-05:00) To: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: Re: Draft language >>> "Ray Ormond" 08/12/2019 06:01 >>> Will do. Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone ------- Original message ------- From: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov> Date: 8/12/19 5:31 AM (GMT-05:00) To: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: Fwd: Draft language >>> "Hugh Hurwitz" 08/12/2019 05:31 >>> In addition to details on those two staff, please pull total staffing info, number vacancies, AWOL, long term leave, etc. Also, status of curr Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone ------- Original message ------- From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (OAG)" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> Date: 8/11/19 11:12 PM (GMT-05:00) To: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov> Cc: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: RE: Draft language >>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (OAG)" 08/11/2019 23:12 >>> Thanks. This is helpful. We can talk tomorrow about the timing. It will also be helpful to get some information about staffing at MCC I've seen additional press reports trying to link the staffing shortages, overtime and Thanks, (b)(6) From: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov> Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2019 9:53 PM To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (OAG) (b)(6) @jmd.usdoj.gov> Cc: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: Draft language (b)(6) as discussed, several options are below. Please note that we should discuss timing of all this. I will need to ensure staff are notified first, and I shoul (b)(5)

text_blocks.content: Re: Draft language From Hugh Hurwitz To Ray Ormond Date 2019/08/12 06:27 Subject: Re: Draft language Attachments: TEXT.htm
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C) an help if needed too. Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

------- Original message ------- From: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov> Date: 8/12/19 5:31 AM (GMT-05:00) To: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: Fwd: Draft language >>> "Hugh Hurwitz" 08/12/2019 05:31 >>> In addition to details on those two staff, please pull total staffing info, number vacancies, AWOL, long term leave, etc. Also, status of curr Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

------- Original message ------- From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (OAG)" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> Date: 8/11/19 11:12 PM (GMT-05:00) To: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov> Cc: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: RE: Draft language >>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (OAG)" 08/11/2019 23:12 >>> Thanks. This is helpful. We can talk tomorrow about the timing. It will also be helpful to get some information about staffing at MCC I've seen additional press reports trying to link the staffing shortages, overtime and Thanks, (b)(6)

From: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov> Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2019 9:53 PM To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (OAG) (b)(6) @jmd.usdoj.gov> Cc: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: Draft language (b)(6) as discussed, several options are below. Please note that we should discuss timing of all this. I will need to ensure staff are notified first, and I shoul (b)(5)

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The content is mostly legible, but some parts are obscured by redactions.
